inclusion.criterion: documented diagnosis of migraine by a neurologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: refractory to standard migraine therapy with persistent severe, debilitating symptoms
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: without changes to their neurological exam within the preceding 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: migraines at least twice a month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: migraines unique and distinguishable from other non-migraine headache pain
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: must sign a consent form for both angiography and for participation in this study, and must be willing to undergo angiography for the evaluation of their symptoms
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: taking vasoactive drugs including epinephrine, norepinephrine, dopamine, dobutamine, isoprenaline, dopexamine, milrinone, amrinon, levosimendan, glucagon, phenylephrine, metaraminol, ephedrine, vasopressin, digoxin, and levothyroxine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: underlying cardiac pathology including but not limited to coronary artery disease, heart attacks, or severe atherosclerosis
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe pulmonary disease requiring supplemental oxygen therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: taking medications similar to nitroglycerin such as phosphodiesterase inhibitors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: contraindications to nitroglycerin or calcium channel blocker use
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: having other headache conditions or pain syndromes
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and HA, denies CP/SOB. No sensory or motor defects.
